pkgmetadata.longdescription: # python-graphql-clientSimple GraphQL client for Python 2.7+## Install```shpip install graphqlclient```## Usage```pyfrom graphqlclient import GraphQLClientclient = GraphQLClient('http://graphql-swapi.parseapp.com/')result = client.execute('''{ allFilms { films { title } }}''')print(result)```### AuthorizationAuthorization tokens can be added to the request using the client's `inject_token` method:```pyclient.inject_token('very-long-and-secure-token')```which defaults to http header name `Authorization`.An alternative http header name for the token can be set by passing in the alternative header name, e.g. for `x-api-key`:```pyclient.inject_token('very-long-and-secure-token','x-api-key')```## License[MIT License](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
